citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an effective pest control program. In the building housing the cracked corn feed for the elk there
are visible rodent feces on the floor and on the framework surrounding the corn. In the large bales of hay in the animal
enclosure there are visible burrows likely caused by mammalian pests. The presence of pests around food supplies can
cause contamination of the food and illness in the animals. Correct by having an effective program for the control of
insect, mammalian, and avian pests.
To be corrected by 7-14-25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
The facility does not have an effective pest control program. In the building housing the cracked corn feed for the elk there 
are visible rodent feces on the floor and on the framework surrounding the corn. In the large bales of hay in the animal 
enclosure there are visible burrows likely caused by mammalian pests. The presence of pests around food supplies can 
cause contamination of the food and illness in the animals. Correct by having an effective program for the control of 
insect, mammalian, and avian pests. 
To be corrected by 7-14-25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
